meanings.definition: Having a greater extent from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The road became wider as we drove further into the countryside.
meanings.sent2: The river is wider than the stream.
meanings.sent3: The wider smile on her face showed how happy she was.
meanings.sent4: His eyes grew wider with amazement as he saw the magic trick.
meanings.sent5: The wider the smile, the brighter the day.

meanings.definition: To become larger in extent from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The river widens as it flows towards the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I hope the path will widen so we can walk side by side.
meanings.sent3: The joke made him widen his eyes in surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of art widened after visiting the museum.
meanings.sent5: The crack in the wall widened with each passing day.

meanings.definition: To make or become more inclusive or comprehensive.
meanings.sent1: The teacher widened the discussion to include all viewpoints.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to widen its product range to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: His attempt to widen the conversation to include aliens was met with laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of the world widened after traveling to different countries.
meanings.sent5: The book club widened its membership to include readers of all ages.
